pullrequest.title: Handle fuel_tools special case on release.py

content.raw:
Using underscore in the command also fails:

~~~
$ ../release-tools/release.py -r 1 ign-fuel-tools 1.1.0 secrettoken --ignition-repo -a ignition-fuel_tools 
Dry-run running:
  hg clone -b default https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-fuel-tools-release /tmp/tmp_AHWkJ

Releasing for distributions: xenial, artful
s3cmd version 1.6.1

 !! Found an underscore in package_alias. It will conflict with debian package names. May be fixed changing the underscore for a dash.
~~~

~~~
$ ../release-tools/release.py -r 1 ign-fuel_tools 1.1.0 secrettoken --ignition-repo -a ignition-fuel-tools 
Dry-run running:
  hg clone -b default https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-fuel_tools-release /tmp/tmpBxu_FX

Error running command (hg clone -b default https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-fuel_tools-release /tmp/tmpBxu_FX).
stdout: 
stderr: abort: HTTP Error 404: Not Found

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "../release-tools/release.py", line 518, in <module>
    go(sys.argv)
  File "../release-tools/release.py", line 410, in go
    repo_dir = download_release_repository(args.package, args.release_repo_branch)
  File "../release-tools/release.py", line 140, in download_release_repository
    check_call(cmd, IGNORE_DRY_RUN)
~~~
content.html:
Using underscore in the command also fails:

$ ../release-tools/release.py -r 1 ign-fuel-tools 1.1.0 secrettoken --ignition-repo -a ignition-fuel_tools 
Dry-run running:
  hg clone -b default https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-fuel-tools-release /tmp/tmp_AHWkJ

Releasing for distributions: xenial, artful
s3cmd version 1.6.1

 !! Found an underscore in package_alias. It will conflict with debian package names. May be fixed changing the underscore for a dash.

$ ../release-tools/release.py -r 1 ign-fuel_tools 1.1.0 secrettoken --ignition-repo -a ignition-fuel-tools 
Dry-run running:
  hg clone -b default https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-fuel_tools-release /tmp/tmpBxu_FX

Error running command (hg clone -b default https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-fuel_tools-release /tmp/tmpBxu_FX).
stdout: 
stderr: abort: HTTP Error 404: Not Found

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "../release-tools/release.py", line 518, in <module>
    go(sys.argv)
  File "../release-tools/release.py", line 410, in go
    repo_dir = download_release_repository(args.package, args.release_repo_branch)
  File "../release-tools/release.py", line 140, in download_release_repository
    check_call(cmd, IGNORE_DRY_RUN)
